# Golden Age Website

This is a modern React/Node.js website for software distribution with the following features:

## Features
- Admin-only login system
- Admin can post comments and files
- Users can post comments
- Users can request tools
- Software downloads without ads
- Modern dark theme UI
- File upload/download system
- User authentication
- Request management system

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React with modern UI components
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- Database: MongoDB/SQLite
- Authentication: JWT tokens
- File uploads: Multer
- Styling: CSS modules with animations

## Project Structure
- `/frontend` - React application
- `/backend` - Node.js API server
- `/uploads` - File storage directory

## Development Setup
1. Install dependencies for both frontend and backend
2. Start backend server
3. Start frontend development server
4. Access admin panel with credentials

This project aims to provide a clean, ad-free platform for software distribution with proper admin controls and user interaction features.
